name: UpdateProjectActivity
description: Use this endpoint to update a single Project Activity.

activityNumber.description:
The number of the activity that is linked to the project.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: false
activityNumber.x-filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

completed.description:
If set to true, registration on the project is no longer allowed.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte

Sortable: false
completed.x-filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte

endDate.description:
The date when registration on the project activity stops being allowed.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte

Sortable: false
endDate.x-filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte

number.description:
The system unique number of the project activity entry. This property is not visible in the UI.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: true
number.x-filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

objectVersion.description:
The object version, required for PUT requests.

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

projectNumber.description:
The number of the project that the activity is linked to.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: false
projectNumber.x-filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

responsibleEmployeeNumber.description:
The number of the employee that is responsible for the project activity.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: false
responsibleEmployeeNumber.x-filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

startDate.description:
The date when registration on the project activity starts being allowed.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte

Sortable: false
startDate.x-filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte
